text: Shane Steven Harper (born February 14, 1993) is an American actor, singer- songwriter, and dancer. He is known for playing Spencer on Good Luck Charlie as well as Josh Wheaton in the independent Christian movie God's Not Dead. His self-titled debut album was released on February 14, 2012. ==Filmography== Movies Year Movie Role Notes 2006 Re-Animated Dancer Television movie 2007 High School Musical 2 Dancer Television movie 2010 My Name Is Khan Tim Tompson Voice (US version) 2010 Flipped Matt Baker 2011 Game Time: Tackling the Past Sean Tate Television movie 2014 God's Not Dead Josh Wheaton 2014 Platinum the Dance Movie Brandon 2015 God's Not Dead 2 Josh Wheaton Pre-producing Television Year Show Role Notes 2006 Dance Revolution Himself / Supporting dancer 2007 Zoey 101 Tenth Grader "Drippin' Episode" (Season 3, Episode 17) 2008 Dance on Sunset Himself / Contestant 2009 So You Think You Can Dance Himself / Supporting dancer Season 6 2010–14 Good Luck Charlie Spencer Walsh Recurring role 2011 Wizards of Waverly Place Fidel "Three Maxes and a Little Lady" (Season 4, Episode 5) 2013–14 Awkward Austin Recurring role (Season 3–4) 2014 Happyland Ian Chandler Main role ==Discography== ===Studio albums=== List of studio albums, with selected chart positions Title Album details Peak chart Sales US Heat.
